item.title: Half Day Whitewater Rafting Trip
item.description: Take to the water for an adrenaline-fuelled white-water rafting excursion in the Glacier National Park. Paddle along the Middle Fork of the Flathead River, enjoy a thrilling 8-mile (13-kilometer) route including Class II and II rapids, and admire stunning views of the John Stevens Canyon and the surrounding Glacier National Park.

image.alt: Half Day Whitewater Rafting Trip

item.title: Half Day Scenic Float on the Middle Fork of the Flathead River
item.description: Take a break from sightseeing and rushing from place to place and spend a few hours floating on the Middle Fork of the Flathead River. This relaxing and rejuventating tour takes place on the boundary to Glacier National Park. Enjoy the scenery as you float and, with luck, spot some wildlife along the way.

image.alt: Half Day Scenic Float on the Middle Fork of the Flathead River

item.title: 2 Hour Rafting on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Appease your appetite for adventure on a 2-hour rafting adventure of the Yellowstone River from Gardiner. Experience the exhilaration of rafting on the frenetic rapids of the Yellowstone River while admiring the spectacular scenery of Yellowstone National Park. Allow a professional guide to direct you to paddle hard and fast over thrilling rapids and, when you reach calmer sections of the water, stop for a refreshing swim in the Yellowstone River.

image.alt: 2 Hour Rafting on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch
item.description: Avoid crowds and maximize your wildlife-viewing experience on this private Yellowstone tour led by a naturalist guide. Journey through Yellowstone National Park while making frequent stops for wildlife encounters as well as scenic and secluded hikes that lead to some of Yellowstone's best destinations and lesser-known geysers and hot springs that lie off the beaten path.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch

item.title: Half-Day Glacier National Park Whitewater Rafting Adventure
item.description: See Glacier National Park in a way that few people get to with this half-day whitewater rafting tour. You'll get your bearings paddling through a calm stretch of water before making your way to the John Stevens Canyon, where you'll tackle a variety of thrilling rapids. A guide will be with you throughout your adventure and beginners are welcome to join in on the fun.

image.alt: Half-Day Glacier National Park Whitewater Rafting Adventure

item.title: Alpaca and Llama Farm Tour
item.description: Get up close with alpacas and llamas and gain a better understanding of their care, feeding, and long history with humans at a farm just outside of Bozeman. Admire the animals and have fun feeding them, haltering them for a walk, bathing them, and even spotting alpaca newborns. Learn the difference between llamas and alpacas and how their fleece is used to make high-quality textiles during this unique farm tour.

image.alt: Alpaca and Llama Farm Tour

item.title: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful
item.description: Explore Yellowstone's famous Lower Loop the easy way on a small-group van tour that takes you to highlights like the Old Faithful geyser, Shadow Canyon, Yellowstone Lake, and the Grand Prismatic Hot Springs. Leave the driving to a professional and ride with a small group of fellow travelers, stopping along the way for short hikes, wildlife watching, and to admire the best scenic overlooks.

image.alt: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful

item.title: Full Day Whitewater Adventure Trip with Included Lunch
item.description: Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of Montana with this full-day floating and rafting tour from West Glacier. Unwind and take in the views as you float—and challenge yourself on Class II and III rapids—on the Middle Fork of the Flathead River, which borders Glacier National Park. During the day, you'll make a stop to refuel with a barbecue lunch on the riverbank.

image.alt: Full Day Whitewater Adventure Trip with Included Lunch

item.title: Yellowstone River 8-Mile Paradise Raft Trip
item.description: Experience Yellowstone from the water with a family-friendly half-day rafting trip, suitable for beginners and experienced rafters alike. You'll make your way along an 8-mile (13 km) stretch of river, passing through a mix of rapids and flat areas. You'll also have the chance to stop for a swim along the way.

image.alt: Yellowstone River 8-Mile Paradise Raft Trip

item.title: Family Friendly Gallatin River Whitewater Rafting
item.description: Experience the thrill of navigating white water on this small-group rafting adventure. Get ready to get wet as you paddle through continuous white water on the Gallatin River with a seasoned guide and enjoy the sensation of the rapids. When there are fewer rapids, stop to take in the beauty of the surrounding forest and wildlife, and enjoy commentary from your guide.

image.alt: Family Friendly Gallatin River Whitewater Rafting

item.title: Exclusive Private Yellowstone Adventure: Explore The Lower Loop
item.description: Explore Yellowstone on your schedule on a private, boutique tour with a personal guide and driver who knows how to capture the best views and see the most wildlife. Stop wherever you want, and take home high-quality snapshots of your group against the park's magnificent backdrops thanks to your guide's photography skills.

image.alt: Exclusive Private Yellowstone Adventure: Explore The Lower Loop

item.title: Ziplining across the Beautiful Gallatin River
item.description: Soar over the Gallatin River and experience the spectacular scenery on this small-group zipline experience. Head to the zipline park and get geared up for your exciting adventure. Then, ascend sky bridges to a tree platform, strap into your ziplines, and fly past limestone cliffs, pine forests, and over the river on this exhilarating excursion.

image.alt: Ziplining across the Beautiful Gallatin River

item.title: Full Day Glacier National Park Whitewater Rafting Adventure - With Lunch!
item.description:
Explore Glacier National Park's Wild and Scenic border river, the Middle Fork Flathead, with our highly trained, friendly, interpretive river guides. First, float a relaxing stretch of river. Next, your guide selects a secluded spot for a delicious, buffet style lunch. Our kitchen sources locally and organically whenever possible, and you’ll taste the difference!
After lunch, explore 9 named rapids - typically rated class II and III. Bonecrusher is always a favorite! This is a fun and splashy adventure through pristine, glacially fed waters. Finally, float beneath Glacier’s historic Old Belton Bridge. Your adventure ends in West Glacier with a 5 minute bus ride back to our campus.
Trips depart rain or shine. Trips meet at 9:15am, 9:45am departure. No experience necessary.
No maximum weight - must be able to buckle a 58" chest life jacket. Minimum age 5, minimum weight of 50 pounds. Minimums may be higher if river levels are higher, as they often are in the spring.

image.alt: Full Day Glacier National Park Whitewater Rafting Adventure - With Lunch!

item.title: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from West Yellowstone
item.description: The Yellowstone National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage site and the oldest national park in the United States. On this full-day, small-group tour, take in highlights such as the Mud Pots, and the iconic Old Faithful geyser; enjoy spectacular views over the Grand Canyon; and look out for native wildlife including grizzly bears, grey wolves, and bison.

image.alt: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from West Yellowstone

item.title: Glacier National Park Scenic Float
item.description: This scenic float along the southern border of Glacier National Park offers a restful, rejuvenating experience along the Middle Fork of the Flathead River. With your guide paddling downstream, this is a great option for families, small children, and those with no rafting experience. Make it extra-special by booking dinner—a meal cooked on the river’s edge by your guide.

image.alt: Glacier National Park Scenic Float

item.title: Yellowstone Full Day Private Tour
item.description: Yellowstone National Park can be overwhelming at first, so get a great introduction on a private, full-day tour that combines driving and hiking and is tailored around your group's interests. Leave the guidebook behind and let expert naturalist guides show you the best of West Yellowstone, from erupting geysers and bubbling hot springs to magnificent canyons and waterfalls.

image.alt: Yellowstone Full Day Private Tour

item.title: Scenic Float on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Succumb to the serenity of the Yellowstone River during a scenic 2-hour float on an inflated raft. With a professional guide, meander 6 miles past stunning scenery and incredible wildlife while listening to informative commentary. Bring a waterproof camera in order to capture photographs of Osprey birds and the magnificent Gallatin Mountains as you cruise down the beautiful river. This excursion is perfect for families with young children, and for those who prefer a more relaxed alternative to white water rafting.

image.alt: Scenic Float on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Full Day Rafting on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Experience the exhilaration of rafting on the Yellowstone River on a half-day rafting trip from Gardiner. Under the guidance of an expert instructor, paddle on rapids classified as Class II and III and admire the beautiful scenery of the Gallatin National Forest. Discover the rugged beauty of Yankee Jim Canyon and revitalize with a delicious picnic lunch midway through your adventure. Allow a professional photographer to capture photos of your unforgettable day and opt to purchase the mementos when your tour concludes.

image.alt: Full Day Rafting on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Madison River Guided Kayak Tour
item.description: Spend half a day kayaking down the Madison River during this guided excursion, ideal for participants of all skill levels looking for an alternative to the standard walking tours. Alongside a small group capped at ten, listen as your guide tells you about the local scenery, wildlife, and history, information you wouldn’t get if kayaking independently.

image.alt: Madison River Guided Kayak Tour

item.title: Yellowstone Wildlife Safari from Bozeman - Private Tour
item.description:
Yellowstone National Park forms the core of the Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem, with one of the highest levels of wildlife diversity in North America. Our full-day private safari endeavors to highlight the hundreds of species of animals and plants that call this place home by utilizing the vast knowledge and experience of our naturalist guides.
Our guides provide not only the understanding of wildlife habits, and the story of their importance on the landscape. Throughout the day as you ride in our comfortable vehicles, your guide will educate and converse with you about the incredible ecosystem. They will also be attuned to all our guests' needs and desires, and will plan accordingly for walking, viewing, picnicking and moments of wilderness solitude. The use of optics such as binoculars and spotting scopes makes for incredible and personal moments of connection with this wild place. Your guide is at your service to help you have the best experience from start to finish.

image.alt: Yellowstone Wildlife Safari from Bozeman - Private Tour

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: Hot Springs, Wildlife, & Waterfalls
item.description: Spend an unforgettable day with a guide who’ll take care of everything from your route to your lunch to wildlife safety. See Yellowstone National Park like a seasoned expert thanks to a tour leader passionate about making your trip to the park the best it can be, from wildlife spotting to picking you up in a comfortable vehicle.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: Hot Springs, Wildlife, & Waterfalls

item.title: West Glacier & Polebridge Scenic Driving Tour
item.description: See many of the highlights of Glacier National Park without worrying about navigation or logistics—and enjoy a fully personalized sightseeing experience—on this private, half-day driving tour. With round-trip transit from Whitefish, getting there is comfortable and hassle-free. Led by your driver-guide, discover highlights from the Hungry Horse Dam and Lake McDonald to the North Fork River, Polebridge, and beyond, all in just half a day.

image.alt: West Glacier & Polebridge Scenic Driving Tour

item.title: Best Of Yellowstone Full Day Nat'l Park Tour From Bozeman
item.description:
Yellowstone National Park is one of America’s great treasures. This full day safari will show off the highlights of this incredible place; volcanic thermal features, giant waterfalls, diverse wildlife, the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone, and Yellowstone Lake.
Throughout the day we will drive scenic roads, walk historic boardwalks, enjoy the peace of natural landscapes and use our optics to view wildlife. Your guide is your driver, and their goal is to cover as many of Yellowstone’s famous features as they can in a day.
The guides at Yellowstone Safari Co. will make every effort to showcase as many highlights as possible, and will structure the day around making your experience a memorable one. They will take current road conditions, weather, seasonality, and your personal interests into consideration as they move through the park.
Highlights Old Faithful & Grand Prismatic Spring Lower and Upper Falls, Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone Geysers, Hot Springs, Mudpots & Fumaroles

image.alt: Best Of Yellowstone Full Day Nat'l Park Tour From Bozeman

item.title: Half Day Whitewater Rafting with Riverside Dinner
item.description: If there’s one surefire way to get away from the crowds in Glacier National Park, it’s getting on the water. And with this whitewater rafting experience, you’re not just guaranteed spectacular views, immersion in nature, and a high-adrenaline time on class II-III rapids—you’ll also get an off-grid barbecue dinner, your reward after an awesome day’s adventure.

image.alt: Half Day Whitewater Rafting with Riverside Dinner
